snippet: The opposition will pursue a constitutional amendment, a recall referendum and a campaign for the resignation of President Nicolás Maduro, an opposition leader said.
abstract: Venezuela’s opposition coalition settles on strategy to oust Pres Nicolas Maduro before his term ends in 2019.
lead_paragraph: The opposition will pursue a constitutional amendment, a recall referendum and a campaign for the resignation of President Nicolás Maduro, an opposition leader said.

headline.main: Venezuela: Opposition Hones Plan to Remove the President This Year
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Venezuela: Opposition Hones Plan to Remove the President This Year
